domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: About 10 days ago for two days I had a crushing headache (I don't suffer from them) and a very sore throat for two days. I always have a bit of a cough. Immediately after I felt better my husband had the same. I just thought it was a passing cold. Thoughts?
